title.en: Prayer for the Future of the Dharma

text.en: To the buddhas: Vipaśyin, Śikhin, Viśvabhū,
Krakucchanda, Kanakamuni, and Kāśyapa,
text.en-trans: khorwa jik dang sertub ösung dang

text.en: And Śākyamuni—Gautama, deity of all deities,
text.en-trans: shakya tubpa gautam lha yi lha

text.en: To the seven warrior-like buddhas, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: sangye pawo dün la chaktsal lo

text.en: “In the past, to benefit beings,
I bore all kinds of hardship,
And gave up my own happiness, through this
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “In the past, for the sake of the sick,
text.en-trans: ngé ngön nepé ché dak tu

text.en: I gave my life away;
So, to protect the needy and the poor,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “By my giving up sons, daughters, and wives,
Riches and elephants and chariots,
For the sake of the treasure of enlightenment,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through the offerings I made to the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas,
Śrāvakas, male and female,
text.en-trans: nyentö pa dang ma dang ni

text.en: And to the great sages,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through the sufferings I endured
For many millions of aeons,
Seeking instruction for the sake of enlightenment,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through my conduct of discipline,
And age-long asceticism,
And my offerings to the buddhas of ten directions,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through my diligence in the past,
Constantly stable, and overcoming others’ disruption;
So as to liberate all beings,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through my constant practice of patience
And my tolerance of beings’ harmful acts
Caused by the degeneration of their negative emotions,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through my concentration, perfect freedoms,2formless absorptions,
And samādhis as many as the grains of sand in the river Ganges—
Through the power of my meditation,
text.en-trans: gompé dé tü dak gi ni

text.en: May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through seeking wisdom in the past,
By practising austerities in the forest,
And teaching countless śāstras to others,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
text.en-trans: tenpa yün ring bar gyur chik

text.en: “Through giving, out of love, my flesh and blood,
text.en-trans: tsewé gyu yi sha trak dang

text.en: Giving my life away entirely,
And giving arms and legs and every part of my body,
May the way of the Dharma flourish and expand!
text.en-trans: chö tsul nampar pel gyur chik

text.en: “In the past, with loving kindness, I caused
Harmful sentient beings to mature completely,
And I led them to the three vehicles; through this
May the gift of Dharma thrive and grow!
text.en-trans: chö kyi chöjin gyé gyur chik

text.en: “In the past, with skilful means and wisdom,
I liberated sentient beings from perverse views,
text.en-trans: semchen ta ngen lé dral zhing

text.en: And led them to the correct view; through this
May the Dharma increase in every way!
text.en-trans: chö ni nampar pel gyur chik

text.en: “With the four means of attracting disciples,3
text.en-trans: dak gi semchen du ngö zhi

text.en: I released beings from the fire of the emotions,
And vanquished rampant negativity; through this
text.en-trans: dak gi pel dik pam jepé

text.en: May my followers remain, long into the future!
text.en-trans: dak khor yün ring né gyur chik

text.en: “I freed tīrthikas and others
From the rivers of different views,
And led them to the correct view; through this
May my followers always have devotion!
text.en-trans: dak khor taktu gü gyur chik

text.en: May the teachings blaze, long into the future!”
text.en-trans: yün ring tenpa bar gyur chik
